name: Thresh
title: the Chain Warden
lore: Sadistic and cunning, Thresh is an ambitious and restless spirit of the Shadow Isles. Once the custodian of countless arcane secrets, he sought a power greater than life or death, and now sustains himself by tormenting and breaking others with slow, excruciating inventiveness. His victims suffer far beyond their brief mortal coil as Thresh wreaks agony upon their souls, imprisoning them in his unholy lantern to torture for all eternity.
blurb: Sadistic and cunning, Thresh is an ambitious and restless spirit of the Shadow Isles. Once the custodian of countless arcane secrets, he sought a power greater than life or death, and now sustains himself by tormenting and breaking others with slow...
allytips: Communication is key when making use of Thresh's lantern. Let your teammates know how you like to use it.
Death Sentence and Flay can be combined in either cast order for powerful combinations.
Thresh can collect souls without needing to kill units himself. Planning your map position to be near the most deaths will help to maximize soul collection.
enemytips: Thresh's Death Sentence has a long cast time. Watch for the cast to begin to take evasive actions.
Intentionally breaking a wall of The Box can allow a vulnerable ally to escape unscathed.
Thresh relies on collecting souls for a portion of his defense and damage. Try punishing him when he moves to collect them.

riot_spell_q.name: Death Sentence
riot_spell_q.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Thresh throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, granting True Sight and stunning the first unit hit, pulling them in for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Reactivating this ability will pull Thresh to the bound enemy.

Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }} seconds if it hits an enemy.

riot_spell_w.name: Dark Passage
riot_spell_w.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Thresh throws the Lantern to a target location. If an ally clicks on it Thresh will pull both the Lantern and his ally to him.

The Lantern grants a shield lasting {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f6 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near it. The shield amount scales with the number of souls Thresh has collected.

riot_spell_e.name: Flay
riot_spell_e.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Passive: Thresh's basic attacks deal from {{ f3 }} to {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) additional magic damage, which builds up while not attacking (total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% total Attack Damage).

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a line beginning behind Thresh. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} second.

Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.

riot_spell_r.name: The Box
riot_spell_r.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Thresh creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds, but break that wall.

Once one wall is broken, the remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.

riot_spell_i.name: Damnation
riot_spell_i.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Damnation
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Basic Attacks:}} '''Thresh's''' [[basic attack]]s don't use {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} and his basic attack wind-up is only reduced by {{fd|0.25}}% per {{sti|as|{{as|1% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} (compared to the standard 1% per 1%).
wikia_skill_i1.description2: {{sbc|Innate:}} Enemies who die near '''Thresh''' drop ''souls'' for 8 seconds, which he can collect by either approaching them or by placing {{ais|Dark Passage|Thresh}} lantern near them. Each collected ''soul'' permanently grants '''Thresh''' {{sti|ap|{{as|{{fd|0.75}} '''bonus''' ability power}}}}, {{sti|armor|{{as|{{fd|0.75}} '''bonus''' armor}}}} and increases {{ais|Dark Passage|Thresh}} shield's strength and {{ais|Flay|Thresh}} minimum {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} by 1.
wikia_skill_i1.description3: Champions and large enemies always drop 1 ''soul'', epic [[monster]]s always drop 2, but small [[minion]]s and monsters only have a 33% chance to drop 1. ''Souls'' are visible to allies and only become visible to enemies if their team has {{tip|sight}} of '''Thresh'''.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* The probability for ''souls'' dropping from small minions and monster on {{tip|Summoner's Rift}} starts at 33% but adjusts dynamically to match the expected quota of ''souls'' dropped (lowers if above, rises if below, remains if even). ''Souls'' collected are not considered when adjusting the probability.
* ''Thresh'' gains the ''Soul Gluttony'' buff and resets ''Damnation's'' counter every time he collects 255 souls.
** The maximum amount of ''souls'' '''Thresh''' can collect is 999,999, granting him {{as|749,999 '''bonus''' ability power}} and {{as|749,999 '''bonus''' armor}} ({{fd|99.99}}% damage reduction, reduced to {{fd|99.98}}% when hit by {{ii|Last Whisper}}).
* {{ci|Nunu|Nunu & Willump}} drop a soul each (sometimes the icy ghosts from {{iis|Twin Shadows}} active will drop one each after reaching their targets).
* At level 18:
** 66 ''souls'' are required for ''Thresh'' to reach {{cis|Gnar}} level 18 base armor ({{as|{{fd|65.6}}|armor}}).
** 70 ''souls'' are required for ''Thresh'' to deal more damage with a fully-charged {{ai|Flay|Thresh}}-enhanced basic attack than {{ci|Vayne}} with a fully-ranked {{ai|Final Hour|Vayne}}-enhanced basic attack ({{as|154 AD}} with no [[item]]s or [[rune]]s).
** 144 ''souls'' are required for ''Thresh'' to have more armor than {{ci|Malphite}} with a fully-ranked {{ai|Brutal Strikes|Malphite}} ({{as|{{fd|124.2}}|armor}} with no items or runes).
** 168 ''souls'' are required for ''Thresh'' to deal more damage with {{iis|Lich Bane}} {{nie|Spellblade}} than with {{iis|Trinity Force}}.
** 278 ''souls'' are required for ''Thresh'' to have more armor than {{ci|Rammus}} with a fully-ranked {{ai|Defensive Ball Curl|Rammus}} ({{as|224|armor}} with no items or runes).

wikia_skill_q1.name: Death Sentence
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|First Cast - Death Sentence:}} After a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, '''Thresh''' throws out his scythe in the target direction and forms a tether with the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Hitting an enemy reduces ''Death Sentence's'' {{stil|cooldown}} by 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: While the tether persists, '''Thresh''' is {{tip|disarm|disarmed}} and periodically tugs at his scythe's chain, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} the target a short distance towards himself. After {{fd|0.5}} seconds, or instantly upon hitting a minion or monster, '''Thresh''' can cast {{ai|Death Leap|Thresh}} while the tether holds.
wikia_skill_q1.description3: {{sbc|Second Cast - Death Leap:}} '''Thresh''' {{tip|dashes}} to the tethered enemy, removing the {{tip|stun}} but becoming able to attack again.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* ''Thresh'' will [http://na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=33837947#post33837947 not face in the target direction] during ''Death Sentence's'' cast animation (only after the projectile starts traveling).
* ''Death Sentence's'' {{tip|stun}} duration is reduced by {{sti|[[Tenacity]]}} while the tether will persist for the full duration (unless broken by {{nie|Quicksilver}}, {{ii|Mikael's Crucible}}, {{si|Cleanse}}, or certain [[Champion ability|abilities]]).
** Targets affected by {{ai|Black Shield|Morgana}} will not be {{tip|stun|stunned}} or {{tip|airborne|pulled}} at when hit (''Thresh'' will not tug at his target even if {{ai|Black Shield|Morgana}} wears off before ''Death Sentence'' ends).
** ''Death Sentence's'' tether will not be broken by becoming [[Untargetability|untargetable]] ({{ai|Playful|Fizz}}, units grabbed by {{ai|Force of Will|Syndra}}).
** ''Death Sentence's'' effects will persist if ''Thresh'' dies before the duration ends.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Dark Passage
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' throws his lantern to the target location, {{tip|sight|revealing}} its immediate surroundings and collecting nearby {{ai|Damnation|Thresh|souls}} for the duration. The lantern remains for 6 seconds and automatically returns to '''Thresh''' if he moves more than 1500 units away from it.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: '''Thresh''' and the first ally to come near the lantern is {{tip|shield|shielded}} for 4 seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.description3: An ally that grabs the lantern will {{tip|dash}} to '''Thresh's''' location and shield themselves for the same duration.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* The lantern is considered terrain while active, slightly displacing enemies standing in the target area (is not considered a [[crowd control]] effect) but not interrupting [[channel]]s.
* Allies can pick up the lantern through small walls if its grab radius allows it.
* ''Thresh'' cannot grab the lantern but can shield himself if he walks near it.
* The lantern can be targeted by {{si|Teleport}}, {{ai|Leap Strike|Jax}}, {{ai|Shunpo|Katarina}}, and {{ai|Safeguard|Lee Sin}}.
* The lantern's duration and maximum leash range are each displayed as a circle on the ground.
* Allies carried by ''Dark Passage'' will dash to ''Thresh's'' current location (not where he was when the lantern was picked up).
* Contrary to popular belief, ally picking up the lantern will NOT be untargetable during the dash. They can be attacked, targeted and suffer crowd controls normally.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Flay
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Thresh's''' basic attacks deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, increasing with time spent not attacking enemy units or neutral monsters.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|Collected {{ai|Damnation|Thresh|souls}} (+ up to {{as|{{ap|100 to 200}}% AD}})}}
wikia_skill_e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Thresh''' sweeps his chain in a broad line towards the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit, {{tip|airborne|knocking}} them in the chain's direction, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them afterwards for 1 second.

wikia_skill_r1.name: The Box
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.75}}-second delay, '''Thresh''' surrounds himself with 5 spectral walls, each lasting for up to 5 seconds. Walls break upon contact with an enemy champion, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} by 99% for 2 seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: Enemy champions hitting any wall beyond the first take no damage and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for only 1 second.
